mapper.select: SELECT a.brdid, a.title, b.nickname, a.likes, CASE WHEN a.regdate > CURDATE() THEN DATE_FORMAT(a.regdate, '%H:%i:%s') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(a.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') END as regdate FROM brd_freeboard a LEFT JOIN info_userinfo b ON a.userno = b.userno ORDER BY a.likes DESC, a.regdate desc LIMIT 15
SELECT nid, title, CASE WHEN regdate > CURDATE() THEN DATE_FORMAT(regdate, '%H:%i:%s') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') END as regdate FROM info_notice ORDER BY regdate DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT brdid, title, CASE WHEN regdate > CURDATE() THEN DATE_FORMAT(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') END as regdate FROM brd_employment WHERE empid = 1 ORDER BY brdid DESC LIMIT 6

SELECT brdid, title, CASE WHEN regdate > CURDATE() THEN DATE_FORMAT(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') END as regdate FROM brd_schoolwork WHERE swid = 2 ORDER BY brdid DESC LIMIT 6

SELECT a.brdid, a.title, CASE WHEN a.regdate > CURDATE() THEN DATE_FORMAT(a.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') ELSE DATE_FORMAT(a.regdate, '%Y-%m-%d') END as regdate, b.name as orgname FROM brd_orgnization a LEFT JOIN info_organization b on a.orgid = b.orgid ORDER BY brdid DESC LIMIT 5
